description.para: The prometheus module provides a simple way to push data into reconnoiter via the prometheus write support. Simply configure prometheus to write to the provided URL in its /write endpoint.

checkconfig.parameter: Specify the secret with which metrics may be submitted. Those lacking the secret in the URL will be ignored.

example.title: Posting prometheus data
example.para: POST payload is a snappy encoded Protobuf defined here: https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus/blob/master/prompb/remote.proto#L21
example.programlisting: <noit> <modules> <module image="prometheus" name="prometheus"/> </modules> <checks> <check uuid="1b4e28ba-2fa1-11d2-893f-e9b761bde3fb" module="prometheus" target="127.0.0.1" period="60000" timeout="30000"> <config><secret>s3cr3tk3y</secret></config> </check> </checks> </noit>
